snippet.title: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Dwarf Slayer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
When in doubt, go to the biggest monster you can see and split em' down the middle. Take the Slayer's oath, grab your axes and let the massacre begin. 

Journey across the Fantasy Battles universe with up to four friends in local and online co-op. Warhammer: Chaosbane is coming to Xbox One, PS4 and PC on June 4th, 2019.
-------------------------------
